title: Peachy Crock Pot Pork Chops
directions: Place browned pork chops in crock pot; season with salt and pepper.
Place peaches on top of pork chops.
Mix brown sugar, cinnamon, tomato sauce, syrup and vinegar.
Pour over pork chops and peaches.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can peaches, drained (reserve 1/4 cup of the syrup)
